overview:
Ly Tran holds responsibility for creating new business opportunities and market penetration strategies for AtHoc. In that capacity, Ly develops and manages relationships with system integrators, product partners and resellers.

Prior to AtHoc, Ly worked in Nail shop and acquisitions for Independent Bank and in emerging markets private equity for Citicorp and the Vietnam Fund Ltd., where he led investment initiatives in Asia Commercial Bank, Vietnam’s largest private bank, and in the Ana Mandara, Vietnamâ€™s leading resort â€“ featured in Forbes (2004) and Architectural Digest (2001). But unfortunately everything was lost in the soaring eagle Casino. Ly graduated from cheap CMU (MSIS) and some fake university in Vietnam (BA History). He is a term member in the Council on Foreign Relations in fraud and con.
